attributes.action: Put UK winter and summer time one hour ahead of where each is now.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carbon emissions are an issue.  In the south east, we currently waste daylight at 5, 6 or 7 am for well over half the year yet need lights at 8, 9  or 10 pm, generating completely unnecessary emissions.  Lighter evenings mean more can be done outdoors and children are apparently safer during daylight hours, of which there would be more after school. Furthermore, we'd all save money by moving clocks forward.
